capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role requires achieving outcomes in the maintenance and improvement of park assets, including pest and weed control, and fire management activities.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Field Officers must effectively plan and prioritize tasks to manage the diverse range of activities related to park maintenance and conservation.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: The role involves solving problems in the field, requiring analytical thinking and practical solution development.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Field Officers are responsible for their actions, adhering to legislation and policy, and proactively addressing risks in their day-to-day work.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Requires self-motivation and a measured approach to work, with a commitment to learning and developing the necessary skills for the role.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Effective communication is essential for yarning with the community, responding to visitor enquiries, and working closely with the team.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: The role involves working as part of a team, requiring collaboration and valuing the contribution of others.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Respecting cultural knowledge and working alongside Traditional Owners is a key aspect of the role.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Field Officers assist with projects related to the conservation and maintenance of park assets.

skills.name: Cultural Knowledge
skills.description: Understanding and respecting the cultural significance of Worimi Conservation Lands and working with Aboriginal communities.

skills.name: Safety and Compliance
skills.description: Adhering to safety protocols and obtaining necessary certifications for equipment operation and firefighting.

skills.name: Physical Fitness
skills.description: Maintaining a level of fitness necessary for outdoor work, including firefighting and equipment operation.

generalRole.title: Conservation and Cultural Heritage Field Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves a combination of environmental conservation tasks and cultural heritage management, specifically within Aboriginal-owned lands, requiring a blend of technical skills, cultural knowledge, and physical fitness.
